long_description:
Planning a getaway with your sweetheart to celebrate your anniversary? Here are some fantastic Napa Valley anniversary ideas for you to enjoy together! Whether you’re looking to explore local wineries, browse art galleries, go on an outdoor adventure, or  try something completely new, we’ve got you covered! Here are 5 of the best Napa Valley anniversary ideas.

Be sure to book our Anniversary Package for a little something extra special!

5 Napa Valley Anniversary Ideas

Indulge in a Unique Olive Oil Tasting Tour

There are so many wonderful Napa Valley anniversary ideas to enjoy right here in St. Helena, just minutes from The Wine Country Inn & Cottages. And many of them offer truly unique experiences, like Napa olive oil tastings and tours. A Napa Valley olive oil tasting can be a deviation from your traditional wine tastings. Try something new during with your partner during your stay at The Wine Country Inn & Cottages! Featuring a variety of curated blends to pair with bread and other dipping ingredients, an olive oil tasting in St. Helena will entice your taste buds and provide one-of-a-kind memories for years to come.

Take a Ride on the Napa Valley Wine Trolley

You’ll love experiencing Wine Country together with the classic trolley tour. This 6-hour adventure is a great option of Napa Valley anniversary ideas. You will get to see the region while tasting world-class wines in the process. The open-air Napa Valley Wine Trolley will take you through the towns of Napa, Yountville, Oakville, and Rutherford. You’ll make a stop at four wineries along the way; these vary depending on the day of the week. This means you can go every day of the week and experience entirely new wineries! Beginning at the Oxbow Market and ending in downtown Napa, the classic tour includes a catered picnic lunch. Enjoy your scenic meal in a wine cave or outside in the gardens alongside the vineyards. You’ll feel the cool winds and warm sun as you ride through beautiful Napa Valley en route to delicious wine!

Admire the Sculpture Gardens at the Di Rosa Art Gallery

Though the culinary scene in Napa Valley may be the star of the show, local art culture also takes the stage as a key player. When you visit Napa Valley and explore the many vineyards and wineries, you will understand how many of them are closely tied with art. Di Rosa Art is no different. This winery turned art studio now thrives as the most significant holding of Bay Area art in the world. Discover more about Di Rosa Art and why it is a great option of Napa Valley anniversary ideas!

Go Horseback Riding Through the Vineyards and Valleys

Napa Valley has some of the most stunning scenery along the West Coast. And you’ll love soaking in those views with your spouse! Views feature the Pacific Ocean, Redwood forests, and sprawling vineyards. Explore some of this amazing scenery by going Napa Valley horseback riding! There are a few great outfitters in the area that will allow you to embark on some breathtaking adventures. You will remember these fantastic tours for years to come. Wine Country trail rides await, and we know the perfect Napa Valley horseback riding outfitters to take you on your journey!

Book the Anniversary Special at The Wine Country Inn

Rekindle that special marriage moment with a stay at the Wine Country Inn & Cottages. And when you book our Anniversary Special, you’ll get the chance to indulge in something extra special! Enjoy the moment with a chilled split of sparkling wine in any selected room plus local chocolates. Special complimentary winery tasting opportunities are included to add to any Napa Valley Experience. Of course, complimentary Wine Country breakfast is included every morning, as well as wine tastings on the weekends. You’ll love your anniversary getaway to Wine Country!
